day actually came about when we were in

platform engineering and we were really
searching for a space to have this
community discussions and really focused
not just on the tools or the projects
that we see in the space but also more
focus on enduser case studies and
practices and sharing more of a holistic
view of platform engineering and so we
had the idea to put together a
colloccated day i wrote the proposal uh
